THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 10.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING : 2020/KER/1367 Crl.MC 8763/2019 3 ASHOK MENON, J. rT.MC No.8763 of 2019 pated this the 10% day of January, 2020 ORDER Petitioners are accused 1 to 4 in CC No.1004/2015 on the files of the Judicial First Class Magistrates Court, Thaliparamba for having allegedly committed offences punishable under Sections 341, 324 and 506(i17) read with Section 34 IPC. 2. The only defacto complainant/injured is the second respondent herein. He has appeared through counsel and filed an affidavit to the effect that the matter has been amicably settled with the petitioners and that he has no grievance against them. A report to that effect has also been obtained from the investigating officer through the learned Senior Public Prosecutor. The petitioners do not have any criminal antecedents. No public interest is involved. In the result, the Criminal M.Cc. is allowed and hearse cape 2020/KER/1367 Crl.MC 8763/2019 4 the entire proceedings as against the petitioners herein in CC No.1004/2015 on the files of the Judicial First Class Magistrates Court, Thaliparamba_ shall stand quashed under Section 482 cr.PC and_ the petitioners/accused are discharged.
